name: Serfs Galore
description:
In case you have trouble playing the web version, you can download a PC version for a better performance.

Made in less than 48 hours for Miz Jam 1

Controls:
Use mouse & keyboard (arrow keys to move & click to command).

Clicking an object or enemy makes your soldiers interact with it, clicking a soldier makes him follow you again so you can give him new orders. The king dies in one hit, so be careful!

Follow our newsletter and get a free extra level for our other game, TENANT: https://croxel-studios.com/newsletter

Credits:

  • Pablo Moreno (@HypercubeCore):  Level design & VFX
  • Luis Gutiérrez (@Lwyx): Programming
  • Alberto Navarro (@forameuss): Music & SFX

Art assets by Kenney - https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Social media: Twitter – Instagram – Facebook – Website
